products.name: Soft Cotton Polo Shirt - All Fits
Soft Cotton Polo Shirt - All Fits
Classic Fit Soft Cotton Crewneck T-Shirt
Custom Slim Fit Jersey Crewneck T-Shirt
ECOFAST Pure Team USA Jersey T-Shirt
ECOFAST Pure Team USA Jersey T-Shirt

products-detail.descripion: Designed with Mother Nature in mind, The Earth Polo is crafted from an innovative fabric made entirely from plastic bottles and dyed using a waterless process. To learn more about The Earth Polo and Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives, including our global commitment to using 170 million recycled plastic bottles in our products and packaging by 2025, please visit RalphLauren.com/earthpolo.
products-detail.content1: Custom Slim Fit: a trim silhouette in between our Classic Fit and Slim Fit. Sleeve hugs the bicep. Tailored through the waist.
products-detail.content2: Size medium has a 27" front body length, a 28" back body length, a 17½" shoulder, and a 41" chest.
products-detail.content3: Ribbed Polo collar. Two-button placket
products-detail.content4: Short sleeves with ribbed armbands. "Polo" embroidered at the right sleeve. Tennis tail.
products-detail.content5: Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
products-detail.content6: Recycled polyester. Machine washable. Imported.
products-detail.content7: Dyed using a unique process that uses no water in the application of the dye.
products-detail.content8: Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.

products-detail.descripion: Cut from lightweight linen, this summer-ready halter dress is designed with fluid self-ties that can be styled at the front or back of the waist.
products-detail.content1: Fit-and-flare silhouette. Intended to hit at the mid-calf.
products-detail.content2: US size 8 has a 38¼" body length. Body length is taken from the top of the back edge.
products-detail.content3: Surplice neckline. Concealed left-side-seam zipper with a hook-and-eye closure.
products-detail.content4: Halter silhouette.
products-detail.content5: Self-ties at the waist.
products-detail.content6: Front and back princess seams at the skirt. Lined at the body.
products-detail.content7: Shell: linen. Lining: cotton.
products-detail.content8:
Model is 5'10"/178 cm and wears a US size 2.
Style Number: 580721
